description:
Give your busted console a new lease on life with the help of iFixit and get free shipping on orders of $100 or more. Check them out at http://ifix.gd/Techquickie

The US FCC is mandating "Nutrition Facts"-style labels for internet plans. Will it help stop ISPs from ripping you off?

Leave a reply with your requests for future episodes.
